column1: Little Goat Diner////The food wasn't bad by any means
column2: but I have never heard of a place charging $12 for a stack of THREE pancakes topped with apples and fancy crumbs. Luckily I wasn't paying
column3: otherwise I would have settled for a bowl of oatmeal
column4: but I felt terrible for my parents AKA SUCKERS who picked up the check
